content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find the apartment to be a great fit for your needs. How much were you thinking of offering for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking of 400 euros per month. It's a great apartment and I really like it, but I can't afford more.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you're a student and have a limited budget. However, the price you're offering is below my expectations for this apartment. It's a brand new, centrally located property with all amenities nearby. I believe a fair price for this apartment would be closer to 500 euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's too high for me. I would be able to pay 450 euros per month. I would also be a dependable tenant and would take good care of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While 450 euros is more than your initial offer, it's still below my asking price. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the value of this apartment. The location and the quality of construction justify a higher rent. How about 475 euros per month? I think that's a fair compromise. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your offer, but I still think 450 euros is a fair price. I am a reliable person and I will take good care of the apartment. I am also willing to pay the deposit immediately.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm glad to hear that you're a reliable person and that you're willing to take good care of the apartment. However, the deposit is not the issue here. The issue is the monthly rent. I'm trying to find a tenant who can appreciate the value of this property. 450 euros is simply not enough for me. How about we meet in the middle at 460 euros per month? That's a fair compromise for both of us. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I accept your offer of 460 euros per month. I am looking forward to moving into this beautiful apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent news, Maryam! I'm glad we could find a price that works for both of us. I agree to the price of 460 Euro! Please let's proceed with the lease agreement. Thank you for choosing my apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. I look forward to signing the lease agreement. By the way, do you have any recommendations for furniture stores in the area?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Certainly! There are several excellent furniture stores in Magdeburg. One of the most popular ones is IKEA, which is known for its affordable and modern furniture. They have a wide range of options, from beds and wardrobes to kitchen tables and chairs. Another great option is Möbel Höffner, which offers a mix of modern and classic furniture pieces. They often have sales, so it's worth keeping an eye out for discounts. Additionally, there's a local furniture store called König Mobel, which specializes in high-quality, German-made furniture. They have a beautiful selection of pieces that will last you a lifetime. These are just a few suggestions; feel free to explore other options as well. Happy shopping!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your recommendations. I will definitely check them out. By the way, is there a specific date when the apartment will be available?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: The apartment will be available for you to move in starting from the first of next month. This will give us enough time to finalize the lease agreement and for you to make any necessary arrangements. Is this timeline acceptable to you?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, that's perfect. The first of next month works well for me. I look forward to moving in and making this apartment my new home.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful! I'm glad to hear everything is working out. Let's proceed with the lease agreement, and I'll be sure to provide you with all the necessary paperwork and information you need to make your move-in smooth. Thank you again for choosing my apartment, and I look forward to having you as a tenant. If you have any more questions or need assistance with anything, please let me know.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. If I have any more questions, I will let you know. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
